thread.title: Watch video: Mahira Khan lives her 'DDLJ' moment without Shah Rukh Khan, calls it 'cheap thrills'
thread.title_full: Watch video: Mahira Khan lives her 'DDLJ' moment without Shah Rukh Khan, calls it 'cheap thrills' - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Watch video: Mahira Khan lives her 'DDLJ' moment without Shah Rukh Khan, calls it 'cheap thrills'
text:
Mahira Khan 
Pakistani actress Mahira Khan had recently confessed that she expected Raees co-star Shah Rukh Khan to be waiting with open arms when she landed in India for the film's shoot.
While that didn't happen, Mahira evidently enjoyed being SRK's heroine. She posted a video of herself dancing in what looked like a 'sarson ka khet' straight out of the star's 1995 hit, Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge, and wrote, "#cheapthrills. What we couldn't do in Raees!"
WATCH VIDEO: 
  #cheapthrills @bohemiangirl9 what we couldn't do in Raees! 
A post shared by Mahira Khan (@mahirahkhan) onFeb 20, 2017 at 1:59am PST
